alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Howard; Sherman; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 6:41AM CDT until July 18 at 7:15AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN GREELEY...VALLEY...NORTHEASTERN SHERMAN AND NORTHERN HOWARD COUNTIES... At 641 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over North Loup, or 12 miles southeast of Ord, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Scotia around 645 AM CDT. Cotesfield around 655 AM CDT. Elba and Farwell around 705 AM CDT. St. Paul and Cushing around 710 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
